data.title: Evangelization Through Education, from Simple Schooling to Universities in China
data.meta_description: This essay deals with the missionary’s contribution to China’s education and the time frame dating from the eighteenth-century to the present. The discussion covers the areas called The Greater China Area: The Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan....
